subproject.description: The objective of the project is to reduce the growth of energy consumption and related greenhouse gas emissions from transport sector in Pakistan. While simultaneously improving urban environmental conditions and improving Pakistan’s trade competitiveness by 1) creating an enabling investment environment for sustainable urban transport, 2) creating institutional and policy framework that is supportive of urban transit development, 3) improving the fuel efficiency of trucking freight transport and 4) increasing awareness and capacity in Pakistan on sustainable transport
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: ECC-Pak Sustainable Transport

title: (ECC) PIMS 3953 CC FP: Pakistan Sustainable Transport
